рдЕрд▓рдмреЛрдп-рдпреБрджреНрдзрдореН #рейрелреи

Event occured on 1669-08-15 (gregorian). Julian date was converted to Gregorian in this reckoning. Mogol forces under rAma siMha (son of jayasiMha) of Amber defeat Ahom forces under Lachit Borphukan in a forced challenge. 10k Ahom soldiers were killed. This would be reversed a few years later in the Battle of Saraighat, two years later, in 1671 CE.

рдХрд╛рдЮреНрдЪреА релрен рдЬрдЧрджреНрдЧреБрд░реБ рд╢реНрд░реА-рдкрд░рдорд╢рд┐рд╡реЗрдиреНрджреНрд░ рд╕рд░рд╕реНрд╡рддреА реи рдЖрд░рд╛рдзрдирд╛ #рекрейрем

Observed on ┼Ъukla-Da┼Ыam─л tithi of ┼Ъr─Бvaс╣Зaс╕е (lunar) month (Apar─Бhс╣Зaс╕е/vyaapti). The event occurred in 4687 (Kali era).
┼Ъivar─Бmakс╣Ыс╣гс╣Зa, son of Parame┼Ыvara on the banks of river Pamp─Б, devoted to Sad─Б┼Ыiva, having got initiation into asceticism from him, devoid of any attachment indeed, He remained at the abode of goddess K─Бm─Бkс╣г─л. Devoted to the worship of ┼Ъr─л Cakrar─Бja, adhered to the path of ┼Ъivar─Бja, adhered to the path of ┼Ъivayoga, adept in worshipping the goddess K─Бme┼Ыvar─л, He, free from desires, held the preceptorship for fortyseven years. This senior preceptor, courageous, reached the space that is beyond the physical body, on the tenth day of the bright fortnight of the ┼Ъravaс╣Зa month in the year P─Бrthiva of the ┼Ъaka era 1508 (D┼лra ┼Ъaka). According to scholars, this preceptor was the master of Sad─Б┼Ыivabrahmendra and attained siddhi in ┼Ъvet─Бraс╣Зyam.

Son of ┼Ъr─лpati, known as Kс╣Ыс╣гс╣Зa before initiation, the great sage P┼лrс╣Зabodhendra, merged in Brahman on the Ek─Бda┼Ыi (eleventh) day of the bright fortnight of the month ┼Ъravaс╣Зa in the year ─В┼Ыvara. His preceptorship was for seventeen years.

Observed on Kс╣Ыс╣гс╣Зa-Aс╣гс╣нam─л tithi of ┼Ъr─Бvaс╣Зaс╕е (lunar) month (Apar─Бhс╣Зaс╕е/vyaapti). The event occurred in 3548 (Kali era).
Son of ┼Ъr─л Acyuta┼Ыarm─Б of Koс╣Еkaс╣Зade┼Ыa, having offered his services of preparing sandal paste for the worship of ┼Ъr─л Chandramoul─л┼Ыvara, He was offered kingship of Kashmir by King Harс╣гa for his poetical wisdom/merits. Having ruled Kashmir for a short period, He came back to his preceptor Arbhaka┼Ыaс╣Еkara and got initiated into asceticism with the name S─Бrvabhauma Chandrac┼лс╕Нendra Sarasvat─л. Preceptor ┼Ъr─л Chandrac┼лс╕Нendra Sarasvat─л leading for ten years a pious life on the banks of Ganges, establishing on his throne revered Madhura the incarnation of Dhanvantari and adorning him with the title Parip┼лrс╣Зabodha reached/attained his LordтАЩs immortal abode on the night of Kс╣Ыс╣гс╣Зajanm─Бс╣гс╣нam─л in the year Vijaya.
